Serenity Module

This is the pydoc code for the serenity module

class serenity.ship.Firefly(passengers=3)

This class represents the ship which might be considered a main character.

__init__(passengers=3)

Initialize a Firefly object

Parameters

passengers – number of passengers aboard

__weakref__

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

crazy_ivan()

Changes direction by 180 degrees.

Returns

new direction

Actions that can be performed with Firefly and its crew.

serenity.actions.change_pilot(firefly, pilot)

Changes the pilot on a serenity.ship.Firefly instance to the given value.

Parameters

  • firefly – Firefly instance who’s pilot attribute is to be changed

  • pilot – String with the new pilot’s name
